title: Let’s Get Hyped!
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>This hot cocoa with spiced syrup is delicious~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>You should thank Honoka for telling us about it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Honoka-chan said she’s been drinking this to get in the Christmas spirit.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>She’s gonna keep this up for more than a month......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, of course, she would.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>That’s true. When Honoka gets hyped over something, I get excited too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ah! How should we decorate the Christmas tree in the clubroom?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Hmm...... We should go to a store and look!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Alright! We can take some inspiration from the decorations on the street too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Yeah, let’s see if there are ornaments that will get Honoka even more hyped.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
